description.value: You are a cel rau, child of a strigoi, one of the first vampires to walk Golarion. Your heritage ties you to the Shadow Plane and grants you strange resilience to light and darkness alike. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects with the darkness, light, or shadow traits, and whenever you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} for at least 2 rounds, you can reduce the duration by 1 round.
